text:
Akira Kenjou(剣城あきら)

Akira is one of the five main characters of KiraKira☆Pretty Cure A La Mode who is a second year high school student. She is gentle and has a strong sense of justice like a "dog." Akira's alter ego is Cure Chocolat and she is based off chocolates and dogs. (Source: Pretty Cure Wikia)

Kaguya Hayashi(林 香具矢)

Take's granddaughter. She is training to become a Japanese chef and responds favorably when Majime confesses to her. After the time skip it is revealed that she has married Majime, and now owns her own restaurant. (Source: Wikipedia)

Viblis(ビブリス)

She is the more serious of the group. She often scolds Uraganos and Circulas when they argue and is more intimidating. She is also the type to never apologize even when she was wrong. Source Wikipedia

Gokuark(ゴクアーク)

The first of the three demons, originally sealed in the shrine at Koutarou's home. The leader of the three. After his initial defeat by the Ganbare Team, he hides himself within Yamino Ryuuse, until his revived brothers pull him free once more. (Source: starfox.net/hangar/eldoran/GBGanbare)

Bagel

The owner of the grocery store who loves to play jokes on his friends.

Emile Elman(エミール・エルマン)

Emile Elman is the heir to the Elman Family and one of Damian Desmond's followers at Eden Academy. As one of Damian's followers, he is frequently praising Damian's abilities and making fun of Anya and Becky. It is his dream to eat a lot of candy. Emile quickly become friends with Damian Desmond and Ewen Egeburg, praising Damian and commenting that he will become Imperial Scholar in no time. He is willing to sacrifice himself for Damian during the dodgeball tournament, throwing himself in the path of Bill Watkin's ball. He jumps into the river without hesitance in an attempt to save Damian from drowning. (Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

Magetta(オッタ・マゲッタ)

Magetta is a warrior from the sixth universe and is part of Champa's team against Beerus.' Magetta is a member of the Metalman race from Universe 6. Magetta can raise the temperature within his vicinity which can cause the whole area around to become extremely hot. Magetta was able to easily block Vegeta's Galick Gun with his Lava Spit which becomes solidified which can be used as a weapon. Magetta's weight is also so great that not even Super Saiyan Vegeta could lift him. However, one of Magetta's weakness is his low mobilty as he cannot fly. Nevertheless Vegeta himself says it is dangerous to fight him in close quarters, suggesting that he is a great melee fighter. In the manga, Magetta showed himself even more durable, as Vegeta's punches only succeeded in hurting the Saiyan himself. He was also revealed to be over 1,000 tons, making Vegeta even in Super Saiyan form unable to lift him.

Miki(ミキ)

Miki is a young girl who lived in the slums of Shinjuku. Labeled as the "Lucky Little Ghost", those who meet her would fall for her smile, and are somehow befallen with good fortune later on. Previously, she lived in an underground section of Shinjuku Station alone after her mother had passed away several years before. After a hit-and-run accident, she would be adopted by Umibozu and would later on live with him at the Cat's Eye Cafe. Miki is unaware of who her father was, though it was revealed later to the other characters that he was the King of an unnamed country. He often visited Japan while on business and fell in love with Miki's mother who worked in an old bar in a quiet area. Because the political situation in the kingdom was unstable, when she became pregnant, Miki's mother left her job and disappeared. She raised her daughter all alone in an abandoned underground arcade so no one would be able to find them if they discovered their existence. Miki's mother would later die in an accident and Saeko would be the first of our heroes to encounter the little girl. Much later after Miki starts living at the Cat's Eye Cafe, Ryo and Xiang-Ying would find out the King had been killed and replaced with a double. All these events are kept from Miki to protect her. Although this Miki shares the same name as Miki in City Hunter, they are not the same character. Like the Miki in Angel Heart, the Miki in City Hunter was also an orphan and raised by Umibozu, though in City Hunter, this Miki is much older. Miki's hairstyle also appears to be similar to the original Miki in the third and fourth City Hunter series. (Source: Wikipedia)

Akira Satou(佐藤 明 / ファブル)

A professional hitman who is sent to Osaka to live as a normal person for a year.

Gokuwmon(ゴクウモン)

Gokuwmon, who was born from within the boiling magma of Boot Volcano, extracted data from numerous databases to serve as models in its pursuit of strength, becoming a Combat Digimon that awakened to the combat instinct it was born with. Although it is journeying across the Digital World to challenge formidable enemies and satiate the craving engraved inside of its heart, if it encounters an opponent that it judges to be strong it will insolently request a battle, regardless of the situation. However, due to the "Kinkoji" which was placed on Gokuwmon's head by Sanzomon when it was born, its head will be constricted and it will pass out if it swears to excess, so it reluctantly observes decorum. Gokuwmon is proficient in a large number of martial and magical arts, and since the "Nyoikinkobou" in its hand is extensible, it can inflict strikes on enemies that are far away, and is also an all-purpose weapon that can fire a lightning cannon while connected, and fire lightning bullets as pistols when split in two. (Source: Wikimon)

Mifuyu Azusa(梓 みふゆ)

Age: 19 Hair color: Silver Weapon: Chakram Affiliation: Mikazuki Villa (formerly), Wings of Magius A veteran magical girl who fought witches as Yachiyo's partner for seven years. Though kind and gentle, her spirit is weak, which leads her to sometimes make bad decisions. (Source: Magia Record Wiki)

Aikka(アイカ王子)

Prince Aika, is the Prince and Knight of Nourasia. He is one of the main characters in Oban: Star Racers and also one of the characters that appear in pilot video: Molly Star Racer. Prince Aika is Eva's rival. He races using his giant beetle partner, G'dar, and fighting with his arrows which are endowed with magic.

Baan Gania Killas(バーン・ガニア・キラーズ)

Member of Poseidal's Elite 13 (No. 11). Baan Gania is one of the group that are loyal to Giwaza, and joins with him when he rebels against Poseidal. He heads off with Ted Devilas to gather Giwaza's forces, then joins up with the final assault on Sveto. He is killed in a duel with Daba in the final episode while piloting an Ashura Temple. (Source: Wikipedia)

Mumyoui Yatsume(八ツ目無名異)

A member of an old gold mining clan. Family tradition led them to enlongate the limbs of the family members using gold rings to help them mine better. As a result, Yatsume's limbs are about 1.5 times as long as normal, with the notable exception of his left arm, which is twice as long and equipped with metal claws. His teeth have also been sharpened into fangs from a young age. Yatsume took up fighting and joined the Yaminobu Shadow Warriors that tried to kill Kenshin in order to support his clan, who had fallen under hard times. When Kenshin sees and defeats him, he vows revenge and returns in the Jinchū arc under Enishi to extract vengeance. However, before he can fight Kenshin, he ends up fighting Saitō instead and is easily defeated. After Yatsume is defeated by Saitō, Kenshin offers to let Yatsume fight him if he still wants to but suggests that he go up north and use his abilities to help his clan. He is arrested by the police afterwards. Of all those involved in the Jinchū, he appears to show the most respect to his fellow comrades, formally greeting them (albeit from a hole in the ceiling). He also accepts Kenshin's generosity to go on with his life. He is also one of only three of the "6 Comrades" who was actually obsessed with taking revenge on Kenshin. (Source: Wikipedia)

Magna Swing(マグナ・スウィング)

Age: 18 Height: 169 cm Birthday: April 7 Sign: Aries Blood Type: B Likes: Spicy foods, manly men A member of the Black Bulls magic knight squad. Coming from Rayaka out in the countryside, he can easily bond with Asta whom he is profoundly impressed by. His magic allows him to form fireballs which he can hurl at targets. He uses them as baseballs for the unofficial welcoming ceremonies he holds for new recruits. He can also form a magic bat for hitting his fireballs.

Nightmare(ジャック・コネリー)

" Nightmare creeps into people's hearts, sees everything, and controls them at will. He's a devious demon. " - Jack Connery. Being a professional crime planner Nightmare offers his help to other thieves around the world in exchange for half of the stolen treasures. With his help success of the operation is 100% certain. Unfortunately, thieves who accepted Nightmare's help have to pay even greater price, as every one of them get's killed or arrested on the very night of the crime. Later he is revealed to be Jack Connery himself.

Sailor Aluminum Siren(セーラー・アルーミナム・セイレーン)

Sailor Aluminum Siren is the second of the Sailor Animamates to appear. Her human pseudonym in the anime is Reiko Aya, which may be a pun on "puppet," "mermaid," "makeup" and "child spirit." In the manga, Aluminum Siren first appears in Act 44 on the roof of Juuban High School and attacks Usagi and Seiya with Galactica Tsunami. She succeeds in stealing the starseeds of Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter, killing them; but is eventually killed herself by Sailor Star Maker and Sailor Star Fighter. Aluminum Siren won Galaxia's favor by stealing the starseed of her native planet's Senshi, Sailor Mermaid. According to the Materials Collection her hobby is ballads. In the anime, Aluminum Siren makes her first appearance in Episode 182. She's very polite, ditzy and oblivious when off-duty, and is always eating or feeling hungry; once engaged in battle, however, she drops her flaws and becomes completely ruthless. Masquerading as Aya Reiko, she works together with Karasuma Akane aka Sailor Lead Crow, who reveals that they once competed for the position of Number One Animamate. She eventually discovers Sailor Moon's identity and nearly succeeds in killing her, but is stopped by the Guardian Senshi and the Sailor Starlights. Despite learning their identities, Aluminum Siren is killed by Galaxia in Episode 188 for her failure to defeat Sailor Moon. She is the only Animamate who uses her manga attack (Galactica Tsunami) in the anime, although it consists only of throwing nearby water bottles, juice boxes, soda cans, and the like at the Senshi.

Ren Jinguuji(神宮寺 レン)

Age: 18 Birthday: February 14 Zodiac sign: Aquarius Height: 183 cm Weight: 63 kg Blood type: B Instrument: Saxophone Hobbies: Darts Student in S Class, he is a son of the Jinguuji family, making him rivals with Masato, who is also his roommate. He is very flirtatious, and plays the saxophone. In the anime, he, along with Otoya, helps defend Haruka when the officials refused to let her take the entrance exam. In episode four it's shown that even though he acts nonchalantly he has a lot of inner conflict. Through flashbacks it's shown that his mother was a pop idol and after her death his father destroyed all records of her, apart a sole tape Ren manages to save. Throughout the episode this is shown to have affected him deeply.

Marinosuke(摩理之介)

A man belonging to a village of hunters, Marinosuke wanted to bring down rogue bear Masamune which had been infected by a strange mushroom virus and had been terrorizing the villages. (Source: Gintama.wikkii)

Sakura Doumyouji(道明寺 桜)

Blood Type: A Sign: Taurus Height: 163 cm The president of the Going Home Club. She is the self-proclaimed ordinary girl of the club. She has an energetic personality. (Source: Wikipedia)

Otome Tsuzuki(都築 乙女)

Takumi's older sister but they aren't actually blood related . She found Takumi on the street and brought back home just like Nozomi . She runs a Small Cake house Called "Stray Cat" - where Fumino and Takumi works . And she likes to help others , even Animals too [their living room is full of stray cats]

Shimi's Pupil(ニセシミ)

He lures Gene out of his established business and challenges him to a duel.

Itsuki Midoriba(緑葉樹)

Itsuki Midoriba is Rin's "bad" friend and classmate. Being the Don Juan of the class, he is envious of the girls' attraction to Rin and often mentions that he will take care of the girls that he doesn't choose. Itsuki and Mayumi often fight over comments made about Mayumi's bust size, but this is just a cover for his secret love for her.

Himari Azuma(東 日万凛)

Birthday: August 28th (Virgo) Age: 19 Height: 159 cm (5'3") Himari is a beautiful curvaceous young woman and a year older than Yuuki Wakura with back-length dark sea-green hair that is tied in a bow on the back of her head with long bangs brushed to the right side of her head and amber eyes. Recently, her body has become more womanly, as Yuuki noted. Most of the time, she is seen to be dressed in the Anti-Demon Corps' uniform, consisting of a navy blue short-sleeved unit, a red belt, and high-heel boots that reach her thighs. Himari was introduced as being aloof and who was distrustful of Yuuki Wakura during their initial encounter, because he was merely a man, treating him as being inferior compared to the 7th Unit and treating him as a slave, even believe he should be grateful that he was there. She has lots of pride in herself, her powers, and the 7th Unit members more so towards Kyouka who she admires, due to that she gets angry easily. Because of her harsh childhood, she is hardworking, as such, she often trains alongside Kyouka Uzen most of the time in combat training and honing her Peach Blessing. She never slacks off in any of her responsibilities or disobeying orders, berating others for doing so instead. However, she can be hot-blooded in and out of combat herself, viewed as one of the misfits among the 7th Unit. Because of all this, Himari can be easily embarrassed and angry if her abilities or training is put into question, especially her older sister, Yachiho Azuma, for her weakness. Her greatest desire is to become a Hero similar to Yuuki, but Himari wants to become like Kyouka and make up for everything she couldn't accomplish in comparison to her sisters. Himari is the youngest daughter among the Azuma Family, being the daughter of Fubuki Azuma. From childhood, she was compared to her older sisters who excelled at anything, while she was considered a failure, at times studying or training too hard to the point of getting sick. Among her older sisters, Himari was always teased primarily the most by Yachiho who seemed to have made a habit out of it. Even after being happy about gaining her own power from eating a peach from Mato, she realized there were several weaknesses to it. Himari soon became a member of the Anti-Demon Corps' 7th Unit, which was said to have been filled with misfits, becoming the Vice Chief, where she became inspired by Kyouka Uzen. She enjoys her reward time with Yuuki and yearns for more every time. (Source: Mato Seihei no Slave Wiki)

Yuri Flostre(ユーリ・フロストル)

A vice captain of Guardians and an acquaintance of Kanata Age. She has a crush on Kanata, from when he saves her from a stray projectile during a match, in her first year at the academy. She later joins Team E601. She confesses to Kanata in the final episode, using a cake that says "I Love You".

Sera Kurokawa(黒川 瀬良)

The school's tomboyish physician and nurse.

Joe(ジョー / ジャンクドッグ / ノマド)

An underground megalobox fighter who spends his time throwing fights until he meets his rival, Yuuri, challenged by him to fight in the first ever official megalobox fighting arena, Megalonia. Seven years later, he has since changed his name to Nomad, and spends his days wandering aimlessly around the underground rings. (Source: Official Site)

Millie(ミリー)

Millie is one of Yor Forger's three co-workers at Berlint City Hall. Millie is shown to be lively and mischievous, suggesting to Yor that they put snot in the Chief's coffee as a joke and most often seen smiling or giggling. Even though she breaks up with her boyfriend, she doesn't seem bothered and remains cheerful, even asking Yor to introduce her to Yuri. (Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

Magnus Lee(マグナス・リィ)

Race: Vampire Gender: Male Age: About 10,000 years Hair: Light grey Eyes:Black Supposedly Count Lee has lived for over a thousand years. To pass the time he mates with human females. His daughter, Lamika, thinks this behavior is an insult to her father's noble family. The Count, however, doesn't care for her opinions. He sees Doris, bites her and decides to make her his next wife. (Source: Absolute Anime)

Yui(ユイ)

A young and cheerful girl with long black hair who looks no older than 10 years old. Kirito and Asuna found her in a forest in the 22nd floor of Aincrad. After taking care of her, she appears to have lost her memory. She calls Kirito and Asuna "Papa" and "Mama" due to having trouble pronouncing their names which is a side effect of the memory loss. They decided that they would go and search for her friends in the Starting City. Her true identity is actually a players' self-regulation program for mental maintenance, Mental Health Counseling Program or MHCP. After being forbidden by the GM Kayaba Akihiko to come close to the players at the beginning of the death game, she was flooded with errors and broke down. In the process she became an AI that possesses actual intelligence. When the Cardinal system governing SAO decided to erase her, Kirito turned her into a tear shaped crystal pendant. He actually converted her to a part of environmental data for the client program and was saved to his NERvGear's local memory. In ALO, she was able to return to her normal form because ALO was based on a copy of the SAO server. She supports Kirito there as a Navigation Pixie. Kirito and Asuna still treat her as their daughter.
